name: Eternal Survivor
description:
Using 4 different firearms you must survive inside a dungeon room filled with zombies. Each time you level up there is 3 different options to choose from, you can upgrade your weapons, your stats or unlock skills.
- Top down / isometric view
- You move with WASD keys and aim with your mouse
- Shooting is automatic
- Runs lasts for about 15 minutes
- Difficult modifiers to make the run easier or harder
- Different upgrades for weapons or stats
